definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: Is 59:24 chaff;—abs. [[תֵלְדוּ]] ´[[תַּהֲרוּ ח]] [[קַשׁ]] Is 33:11 ye conceive chaff, ye bring forth stubble (fig. of vain attempt of Assyr.); cstr. [[לֶהָבָה]] ´[[ח]] [[יִרְפֶּה]] Is 5:24 (‖[[קַשׁ]]) as flaming chaff sinketh down (sim. of perishing of heedless Judahites).
